reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The U.S. President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief – PEPFAR (Global Health Programs - GHP) aiming to reach sustainable control of the HIV/AIDS epidemic. Support costs incurred for direct support of volunteers in Lesotho, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: U.S. assistance to Lesotho supports the development of a stable, prosperous, and healthy nation. One of Lesotho's greatest challenges is a severe HIV/AIDS epidemic. U.S. assistance to address the epidemic complements a significant effort by the Government of Lesotho, other donors, and many U.S. nongovernmental organizations and universities. The U.S. government also seeks to enhance the professionalization of Lesotho's military by promoting democratic values. These efforts support the broader U.S. government objective of supporting institutions that help underpin the country's struggling democracy.
All costs incurred for direct support of Volunteers, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.
